You're invited to

Monster Mash the Fash

Dance party fundraiser for Defend Migrants Alliance

RSVP now
Date

Saturday, November 1st

5-9pm

About the event

ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š Join us for a spooky dance party in collaboration with local DJs and vendors to raise funds in support of migrants in detention! ðŸ”¥ðŸ§Š

A night of having fun and building community in the face of fascism, featuring:

  • live music from DJ Camisoul, DJ Arkipelago, and DJ Mo Mami!

  • political education

  • a raffle

  • pumpkin smashing

  • and more!

As political violence and surveillance escalate, we refuse to be silent and we refuse to stop supporting one another. This event is a celebration of our resistance and the need to be loud and unwavering in our fight to protect everyone in our community.

Location

El Paseo Community Garden

Tickets

Sliding scale, now or at the door. Venmo @CCHRP or pay in cash.

Proceeds will go to @tanggolmigrantemovement to defend and support the rights and welfare of migrants and their families in the wake of increased persecution and violence.
